meanings.definition: The act of stealing a car by force or threat of force.
meanings.sent1: Carjackings are a serious crime that put people in danger.
meanings.sent2: The police are investigating a series of carjackings in the area.
meanings.sent3: When the carjackings were caught on camera, it looked like a movie scene.
meanings.sent4: The rise in carjackings has left the community feeling unsafe.
meanings.sent5: The news report detailed the violent carjackings that occurred last night.

meanings.definition: The crime of stealing a car by force or threat of force.
meanings.sent1: Carjackings have increased in the city, causing concern among residents.
meanings.sent2: She was a victim of a terrifying carjacking while waiting at a red light.
meanings.sent3: The carjackings in the movie were so unrealistic, they made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The carjackings in the area have become a hot topic of discussion.
meanings.sent5: The police are working hard to prevent future carjackings from happening.
